articles.title: From 38-foot to 120-foot, 5 hazardous asteroids hurtling towards Earth TODAY, says NASA - HT Tech
articles.description: Although one or two asteroids usually fly past Earth every day, what makes today special is that no less than 5 asteroids will be making hazardously close trips to the Earth! NASA has issued alerts about these space rocks. Know all about these 5 asteroids.
